sections.content: Bucks Run 2.5 km ski trail is groomed for skate and classic skiing today, January 21, 2025. There is an additional $5 daily trail fee for the use of Bucks Run or annual permits are available for $125.  Dogs and walkers are not permitted on our groomed trails.

sections.header: Natural Snow Classic and Skate Ski Trails
sections.content: – These trails have not been groomed due to very limited snowfall.

sections.header: Stony Creek Cross Country Ski Rental:
sections.content: Open this weekend January 18th and 19th from 10 a.m. until 5 p.m. (final rental at 4 p.m.) Ski rentals can be booked ahead https://www.metroparks.com/stony-creek-metropark/#cross-country_skiing.  Trails will not be groomed at this time.

Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: Another good day out skating.  Skate lane and tracks in good condition.  A little slower due to frigid temperatures.   Sounds like skiing on styrofoam.   Tracks blown in on connector, but good in the woods.

Stoney Creek Metropark (Shelby Township).conditions: They've finally got enough accumulation to make the golf course skiable. Used waxless rock skis and had a very nice time. Skied some in the woods, flats are doable but wouldn't try any hills, not enough snow yet.

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: Plenty of lake effect , combined with low 20 degree temps, plus the full big groom this morning , makes Nubs Knob red and blue trails as nice as it gets !

nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails are open and in great shape. Trails will be groomed this morning.
nubsNob.nightSkiing: Tuesday through Saturday from 5:30 to 9:00 PM.
nubsNob.comments: Four inches of cold and dry snow fell on Nub's Nob last night and this morning. The majority of this snow was groomed, but expect an inch or two of fresh snow on top of the corduroy in some places. This type of snow is abrasive and will make your skis and snowboarders feel "sticky". The Tune Center can apply a hard wax in a few minutes to improve this situation. Please prepare for the cold today as the forecasted high is only a few degrees. The lifts will spin from 9 AM to 9 PM today with an hour break at 430 PM to prepare for night skiing. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
